text: Dig sites kind-of become your neighborhood when abroad!
Home's where heart-warming nostalgia hits everytime.
Archaeologists getting chased by boulders like Indiana Jones? Funny but way off! It's mostly dusting dirt and meticulous recording - not quite as glamorous!
Dig artifacts by day, see history everywhere by night!
Ancient trash heaps became treasure troves for us... context matters!
Ah, age as society's yardstick - always thought deadlines belong on projects, not people's lives.
